name: Attack on SEA
description: This game takes place under the sea, where the coral reefs and different sea animals thrive. However, humans and their man made products decided to destroy the coral reefs, leaving the sea creatures homeless and injured. The player has to rescue the surviving sea creatures and avoid getting caught by the "giant rock," otherwise known as the industrial ship with the human to stop the illegal capture of these sea animals.  At the end, the player gets a surprise from the sea creatures....
